info.title: ATS Resume Scoring API
info.description:
This API helps developers build Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS) by providing tools to score resumes against job descriptions.

### Key Features:
- **Text Analysis**: Compares raw resume text against job descriptions.
- **PDF Parsing**: Upload PDF resumes directly for analysis.
- **Keyword Matching**: Identifies missing and matching keywords to calculate a relevance score.

Use this API to automate the initial screening process for recruitment platforms.

tags.name: Scoring
tags.description: Core endpoints for analyzing and scoring resumes.

post.description: Analyzes plain text from a resume and compares it against a job description to calculate a match score. Ideal for scenarios where text is already extracted.

resumeText.description: The complete text content extracted from the candidate's resume.
resumeText.example: Senior Software Engineer with 5 years of experience in Node.js, React, and Cloud Architecture...

jobText.description: The complete text content of the job posting or description.
jobText.example: We are looking for a Node.js developer with experience in microservices and cloud platforms...

jobKeywords.description: A specific list of mandatory skills or keywords. If provided, the score will be based on these instead of extracting keywords from 'jobText'.

200.description: Analysis complete. Returns score and keyword details.

post.description: Uploads a PDF resume file, extracts its text automatically, and compares it against a job description. Use this for direct file handling from frontend forms.

resume.description: The resume file to analyze. Currently supports **PDF** format only.

jobText.description: The text of the job description to match against.

jobKeywords.description: A JSON string representing an array of keywords (e.g., '["React", "Node"]'). This allows sending complex data in a multipart form.

400.description: Validation Error - File is missing or invalid format.

500.description: Server Error - Failed to parse PDF or calculate score.

ScoreResult.title: Score Analysis Result
ScoreResult.description: The detailed breakdown of the compatibility between the resume and job description.

totalKeywords.description: The total count of significant keywords identified in the job description.

matchedCount.description: The number of keywords found in the resume.

matchedKeywords.description: List of keywords that successfully matched.

missingKeywords.description: List of keywords present in the job description but missing from the resume.

matchDetails.description: Additional context or warnings (e.g., if no job content was provided).

error.description: A descriptive error message explaining what went wrong.
